page.title: 05Pendock's principle features
page.content: In Pendock and the area around it houses are far apart so people can't get together very often.Also children can't play with their friends a lot unless they are at school.Most people in Pendock as well as having cars have telephones because it is a quicker way to talk to people.Every Tuesday while the school-children are swimming in school there is a mothers and toddlers group and the mothers can talk to each other.Also the post office is a place where people can have a chat. Pendock is divided into two halves Upper Pendock and Lower Pendock.The Parish Church is in Upper Pendock so a wooden church was built in Lower Pendock and is called Pendock Cross Church.The church was built because most people live in Lower Pendock.
